Title: An Easy Way to Make Your Own Papel Picado
Content:
Gather the materials you will need.

• Several sheets of tissue paper
• Scissors
• String
• White glue
Stack a few sheets of paper and fold them in half vertically. Then fold the stack vertically two more times.
To make the design, cut shapes into three sides of the folded tissue paper (two long sides and one short side). Leave some space between each cutout shape.
Open the tissue paper carefully and flatten.
Place the flattened sheets of tissue paper on a flat surface. The straight edge of each panel should be at the top.

Make a thin line of glue 1/2 inch from the top. Lay a piece of string on the glue. Leave some extra string at each end so you can hang the banner when it is finished. Fold the top 1/2 inch of tissue paper over the string. Press firmly and allow the glue to dry.
Now your very own papel picado banner is ready to be displayed!
